source.name: Monthly Transit Service
source.description: This dataset contains six elements for transit systems serving urbanized areas in the United States: Transit Unlinked Passenger Trips (UPT) (also known as "ransit boardings" or "transit ridership") Transit Vehicle Revenue Miles (VRM) Transit Vehicle Revnue Hours (VRH) TransitVehicles Operated in Maximum (Peak) Services (VOMS) Regular service days operated Meta-Data for each modal system, including urbanized area population, annual operating expenses, annual fares, and average passenger trip length

datasets.name: Monthly Transit Service
datasets.description: This dataset contains six elements for transit systems serving urbanized areas in the United States: Transit Unlinked Passenger Trips (UPT) (also known as "ransit boardings" or "transit ridership") Transit Vehicle Revenue Miles (VRM) Transit Vehicle Revnue Hours (VRH) TransitVehicles Operated in Maximum (Peak) Services (VOMS) Regular service days operated Meta-Data for each modal system, including urbanized area population, annual operating expenses, annual fares, and average passenger trip length
